detail_desc: Jacquard-weave jacket in a sturdy wool blend with notch lapels and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener at the front. Jetted front pockets with frayed edges, and frayed edges at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Low-cut swimsuit with a cut-out section at the front, lightly padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust, and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.
Trunks in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and mid-length legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Sports jacket in fleece with a hood and zip down the front.

Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and a detachable tie belt. Pleats at the top, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with creases.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, fine-knit cotton with an appliqué on the front.
Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise details. Smocking with a small frill trim around the neckline, a V-shaped opening at the front with scalloped edges, and short, wide raglan sleeves.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a brushed finish. Wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and draping at the front.

Blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a narrow, rounded collar and ties at the neck. Buttons down the front, a lace frill at the top that continues over the shoulders, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a scalloped lace trim.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a button-down collar and buttons down the front. Yoke at the back, a chest pocket and buttoned cuffs.
Imitation suede mules with open toes, a wide strap at the top and covered, adjustable fastener. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels, 3.5 cm.
Thin metal hoop earrings with coin-shaped pendants. Diameter 2 cm.
Lace push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. T-shirt in ribbed cotton-blend jersey.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist that can be folded down, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Playsuit in a cotton weave with a resort collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and a tie belt at the waist.
Sports vest top in burnout-patterned, fast-drying functional fabric with sheer sections. Loose fit.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in an airy, plumeti weave with elastication and a small frill trim at the top. Long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem. Partly lined.
Tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist. One pair in a cable knit and one pair in a rib knit.
Double-layered hat in soft, rib-knit cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
Fitted top in an airy rib knit with a collar, frill-trimmed button placket and short, frill-trimmed sleeves.
Tube scarf in a soft cable knit with ribbing at the top and bottom.
Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in an airy cotton weave with an embroidered frill trim around the neckline and armholes and a gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine cotton knit with buttons at one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed polo neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hairbands in soft cotton jersey with a decorative knot detail at the front.

Calf-length shirt dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Joggers in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Pyjamas in supersoft jersey. Top with a V-neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and rounded hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and tapered legs.

Short dress in an airy weave with beaded embroidery in a narrow cut at the top with a small collar with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck, an opening at the back and a seam with elastication at the back of the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, A-line dress in jacquard-patterned jersey with a round neck, press-studs on one shoulder and fake front pockets.
Canvas sandals with fringes and a small platform. Jute espadrille-style soles with satin linings and rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
Swim cap with a peak at the front and a flap at the back to protect the back of the neck.

Set with a vest top and shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print on one leg.
Shorts in airy jersey with an elasticated waist, side pockets and wide legs.
Cardigan in a fine knit containing some wool with open front pockets and no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Fitted sports vest tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cotton canvas trainers with lacing at the front, a loop at the back, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with an unlined hood and elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the hem. Long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fluffy knit with a motif on the front and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Cardigans in fine-knit cotton with a V-neck and buttons down the front.
Short-sleeved jersey top with a chest pocket.
Short top in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a square neckline, wide shoulder straps and a zip down the front.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with a high, adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey and a pair of joggers in twill. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.

Sports top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric with reflective print motifs. Stand-up collar, mesh-lined hood, twisted seams at the front, jacquard-knit inside and long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs. Narrow elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas with a jersey top and flannel bottoms. Top with a flock print motif on the front and long, cuffed sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and cuffed hems.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long earrings in metal and plastic with a coin-shaped pendant at the bottom. Length approx. 9 cm.
Trousers in washed, superstretch twill with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Low ribbed section at the waist.

Off-the-shoulder maxi dress in woven fabric with a smocked bodice, double-layered frill trim at the top and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be unhooked at the front. Long balloon sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a seam under the bust and an A-line skirt with a seam and voluminous flounce at the hem. Unlined.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams. Fleece-lined stand-up collar, a detachable hood, press-studs down the front and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
V-neck satin blouse with short cap sleeves, a box pleat at the front, gathered yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from patterned organic cotton. Top with raglan sleeves, concealed press-studs in the side and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Trousers with elasticated ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline,cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved Henley top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a button placket.
Baby Exclusive. Pattern-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Zip-through hoodie in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and diagonal front pockets. Jersey trims.

Blouse in an airy weave with a stand-up collar and gathers at the top to create soft draping front and back. Opening with covered buttons at the back of the neck, long puff sleeves, cuffs with covered buttons, and a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Cotton jersey briefs.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a detachable, padded hood and zip with a chin guard at the front. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Elastic scrunchies in soft velour.
Joggers in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, pockets and ribbed hems.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with a V-neck and padded cups with removable inserts. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a mesh racer back and elastication at the hem. Medium support.
Top in soft, organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.

prod_name: Khloe high leg high waist bott
detail_desc: Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey with a high waist, lined gusset, high-cut legs and half-string back.
